name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForIntravesicalAdministrationOfTherapeuticAgent
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Intravesical Administration of Therapeutic Agent
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to intravesical administration of unspecified therapeutic agents.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes intravesical administration of unspecified therapeutic agents.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes specified therapeutic agents (e.g., BCG vaccine) and therapeutic agents used to manage benign disease (e.g., Intravesical instillation of therapeutic agent for benign disease).)

concept.display: Instillation of bacillus Calmette-Guerin into the bladder (procedure)
Urinary bladder instillation of anticarcinogenic agent (procedure)
Instillation of mitomycin C into bladder (procedure)
Administration of chemotherapeutic agent into bladder via intravesical route (procedure)

contains.display: Instillation of Bacillus Calmette-Guerin into urinary bladder (procedure)
Instillation of antineoplastic agent into urinary bladder (procedure)
Instillation of mitomycin C into urinary bladder (procedure)
Administration of chemotherapeutic agent into urinary bladder via intravesical route (procedure)
